  <script type="text/javascript">
   var a = 20;
   document.write("a = " + a + "<br />");
   {
     let a = 2;
     document.write("a = " + a + "<br />");
   }
   document.write("a = " + a + "<br />");
   var b = 'OK';
   var c = true;
   function myFunction() {
    c = 55;
    var a = 1;   //Sprawdzić, co stanie się po usunięciu „var” przed „a”
    var d = 'NO';
    result = a + c;
    return result;
   }
   var fun = myFunction();
   document.write("a ‐> " + typeof (a) + "<br />");
   document.write("b ‐> " + typeof (b) + "<br />");
   document.write("c ‐> " + typeof (c) + "<br />" + "<br />");
   document.write("a = " + a + "<br />");
   document.write("a + c = ", fun + "<br />");
   document.write("c = " + c + "<br />");
   document.write("b = " + b + "<br />");
   document.write("d = " + d + "<br />");   //Czy ta linia jest widoczna w przeglądarce?
  </script>
  <br>Stronę zmodyfikowano:
  <script type="text/javascript">
   document.write(document.lastModified);
  </script>
</body>
</html>

   }
  }
  myRectangle.print();
  myRectangle.height = 5;
  myRectangle.width = 6;
  myRectangle.print();
</script>
</html>

podpunkt.tytul: Dodanie nowej metody do istniejącego obiektu.
podpunkt.kod:
<html>
<script>
  var myRectangle = {
   height: 10,
   width: 14,
   print: function () {
    alert("Surface = " + this.height * this.width)
   }
  }
  myRectangle.aspectRatio = function () {
   alert(this.height // this.width);
  }
  myRectangle.aspectRatio();
</script>
</html>

<html>
<script>
    function rectangleFn(_width, _height) {
        this.width = _width;
        this.height = _height;
        this.print = function () {
            alert(this.width * this.height)
        }
    }
    var myRectangle1 = new_rectangleFn(11, 3);
    var myRectangle2 = new_rectangleFn(10, 12);
    myRectangle 1.print();
    myRectangle2.width = 6;
    myRectangle2.print()
</script>

</html>

<html>
<script>
    function rectangleFn(_width, _height) {
        this.width = _width;
        this.height = _height;
        this.print = function () {
            alert(this width * this height)
        }
    }
    // myRectangle1 jest utworzony przed dodaniem metody "aspectRatio()" do konstruktora
    var myRectangle1 = new rectangleFn(11, 3);
    rectangleFn.prototype.aspectRatio = function () {
        alert(this height / this width);
    }
    myRectangle1.aspectRatio();
</script>

</html>

<html>

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF‐8">
</head>

<body>
    <script>
        var obiekt = { prop: 5 };
        obiekt.watch("prop", function (id, oldValue, newValue) {
            document.writeln("obiekt." + id + " ‐> poprzednia wartość " + oldValue + ", nowa wartość " +
                newValue + "<br>");
            return newValue;
        }
        );
        obiekt.prop = 1;
        obiekt.prop = 6;
        delete obiekt.prop;
        obiekt.prop = "Lorem ipsum ...";
        obiekt.unwatch('prop');
        obiekt.prop = 0;
    </script>
</body>

</html>

            return this.height / this.width;
        }
    }
    const aspect = new RectangleCl(3, 4);
    alert(aspect.aspectRatio);
</script>

</html>

        var h = d.gethours();
        var m = d.getminutes();
        document.write("Jest już godzina " + h + " minut " + m);
        if (h < 12) document.write("<br> Miłego dnia !");
        else if (h < 17) document.write("<br> Dzień dobry !");
        else document.write("<br> Dobry wieczór !");
    </script>
</body>

<html>

<head>
    ...
</head>

<body>
    <canvas id="myCanvas" width="900" height="500" style="border:1px solid #D8D8D8;">
    </canvas>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var c = document.getElementById("myDraw");
        var ctx = c.getContext("2d");
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(40, 250);
        ctx.lineTo(850, 250);
        ctx.moveTo(50, 50);
        ctx.lineTo(50, 450);
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.strokeStyle = "#FF0000";
        ctx.moveTo(50, 70);
        for (i = 1; i < 780; i++) {
            ctx.lineTo(50 + i, 250 - 180 * Math.sin(i / 50) / (i / 50));
        }
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.strokeStyle = "#8000FF";
        ctx.moveTo(50, 250);
        for (i = 1; i < 780; i++) {
            ctx.lineTo(50 + i, 250 - 180 * Math.sin(i / 5) * (1 - Math.exp(-i / 200)));
        }
        ctx.stroke();
    </script>
</body>

</html>
podpunkt.podpis: Uzyskać efekt jak na poniższym rysunku.

podpunkt.kod:
<html>

<head>
    <title>Zmieniające się tło</title>
</head>

<body>
    <script type="text\javascript">
        d = new Date("October 31, 2018 05:15:00");//Zmień czas i datę, format gg:mm:ss
        h = d.getHours();
        if (h >= 0 && h < 6) {
            //    document.write('<body background="tlo1.jpg">');
            document.getElementById('MyBody').style.backgroundColor = 'silver';
        } else if (h >= 6 && h < 12) {
            //    document.write('<body background="tlo2.jpg">');
            document.getElementById('MyBody').style.backgroundColor = 'white';
        } else if (h >= 12 && h < 18) {
            //    document.write('<body background="tlo3.jpg">');
            document.getElementById('MyBody').style.backgroundColor = 'yellow';
        } else if (h >= 18 && h < 24) {
            //    document.write('<body background="tlo4.jpg">');
            document.getElementById('MyBody').style.backgroundColor = 'gray';
        }
        day = d.getDay()
        switch (d) {
            case 0:
                document.write("Dzisiaj jest Niedziela");
                break
            case 6:
                document.write("Dzisiaj jest Sobota");
                break
            default:
                document.write("To jeszcze nie weekend !")
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>

podpunkt.tytul: Dynamiczna zmiana właściwości elementu o określonym id.
podpunkt.kod:
<html>

<head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Script-Type" content="text/javascript">
    <title>myClock</title>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function myClock() {
            var data = new Date();
            var h = data.getHours();
            var m = data.getMinutes();
            var s = data.getSeconds();
            var t = h;
            t += ((m < 10) ? ":0" : ":") + m;
            t += ((s < 10) ? ":0" : ":") + s;
            document.getElementById("button").value = t;
        }
        setInterval("Clock()", 1000);
    </script>
</head>

<body>
    <div>
        <input type="button" value="" id="myButton" />
    </div>
</body>

</html>

<head>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function runclock() {
            setInterval(function () {
                var today = new Date();
                document.getElementById("myId").innerHTML = day.toLocaleString();
            }, 1000);
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body onload="runclock()">
    <p id="myId"> </p>
</body>

</html>

<head>

    <meta http‐equiv="Content‐Script‐Type" content="text/javascript">
    <title>Links</title>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var links = new Array("http://onet.pl", "http://tvn24.pl", "http://wp.pl") function
            onclickHandler(num) {
            if (num >= 0 && num < links.length) {
                window.open(links[num]);
            }
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body>

        <input type="button" style="width:100px" value="Link 1" onlick="onclickHandler(0);" />
        <br />
        <input type="button" style="width:100px" value="Link 2" onlick="onclickHandler(1);" />
        <br />
        <input type="button" style="width:100px" value="Link 3" onlick="onclickHandler(2);" />
    </div>
</body>

</html>

            var a = parseInt(document.getElementById("a").value);
            var b = parseInt(document.getElementById("b").value);
            var c = document.getElementById("myId");
            var ctx = c.getContext("2d");
            var wynikTekst = "";

    if (apos < 1 || dotpos ‐ apos < 2 || lastpos ‐ dotpos> 3 || lastpos ‐ dotpos < 2) { alert("E‐ mail Invalid !"); }

e4bd132d7.jpg', 'MyWindow', '400', '400');
    return false">
        Pokaż zdjęcie (kliknij dwukrotnie w link)</a>
</body>

<html>

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF‐8">
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function setCookie(cookieName, cookieValue, expiredDays) {
            var d = new Date();
            d.setTime(d.getTime() + (expiredDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
            var expiredTime = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
            document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + ";" + expiredTime + ";path=/";
        }
        function readCookie(cookieName) {
            var name = cookieName + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                    c = c.substring(1);
                }
                if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                    return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
                }
            }
            return "";
        }
        function findCookie() {
            var userCookie = readCookie("TSW");
            if (userCookie != "") {
                alert("Welcome again " + userCookie);
            } else {
                userCookie = prompt("What's your name", "");
                if (userCookie != "" && userCookie != null) {
                    setCookie("TSW", userCookie, 1);
                }
            }
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body onload="findCookie()">
    <p>Odśwież stronę albo naciśnij przycisk</p>
    <form>
        <input type="button" onclick="setCookie(" TSW", "" , 0)" value="Delete Cookie">
    </form>
</body>

</html>
podpunkt.podpis: Napisać skrypt wypisujący liczbę odwiedziny strony.

podpunkt.tytul: Cookie – elementy strony widoczne tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników.
podpunkt.kod:
<html>

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF‐8">
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function setCookie(cookieName, cookieValue, expiredDays) {
            var d = new Date();
            d.setTime(d.getTime() + (expiredDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
            var expiredTime = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
            document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + ";" + expiredTime + ";path=/";
        }
        function readCookie(cookieName) {
            var name = cookieName + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                    c = c.substring(1);
                }
                if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                    return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
                }
            }
            return "";
        }
        function findCookie() {
            var userCookie = readCookie("TSWuser");
            if (userCookie != "") {
                var d = document.getElementById("loginForm");
                d.style.visibility = "hidden";
                var d = document.getElementById("onlyLogIn");
                d.innerHTML = "<br><br><br>This text is only visible to registered users <br>Close browser then open this page again";
            } else {
                var d = document.getElementById("onlyLogIn");
                d.innerHTML = "<br><br><br>Only for registered users!";
            }
        }
        function validate() {
            var hForm = document.forms["login"];
            var uName = hForm.elements["username"];
            var uPass = hForm.elements["password"];
            setCookie(uName.value, uPass.value, ‐1);
            location.reload();
        }
        function deleteCookie() {
            setCookie("TSWuser", "", 0)
            location.reload();
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body onload="findCookie()">
    <table>
        <tr>
            <td id="loginForm">
                <form name="login">
                    <p>Username</p>
                    <input type="text" name="username" value="TSWuser">
                    <p>Password</p>
                    <input type="password" name="password" value="">
                    <p></p>
                    <input name="Submit" type="button" value="Log in" onclick="validate()">
                </form>
            </td>
            <td width="300px">
            </td>
            <td>
                <div id="onlyLogIn" style="width: 300px;height: 200px;border: 1px solid ; text‐align: center;">
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
    <p><br>Do not forget log out</p>
    <form>
        <input type="button" onclick="deleteCookie()" value="Log out">
    </form>
</body>

</html>
podpunkt.podpis: Skrócić czas życia ciasteczka do 5s, następnie po zalogowaniu odczekać 5s i odświeżyć stronę.

<html>

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF‐8">
    <!‐‐ <script type="text/javascript">
        function someFunc() {
        alert('Wykonanie funkcji someFunc()');
        }
        </script>
        ‐‐>
</head>

<body>
    <p id="myP"></p>
    <script>
        try {
            var x = someFunc(); // nie zdefiniowana funkcja
        } catch (error) {
            document.getElementById("myP").innerHTML = error.message; // informacja o błędzie
        } finally {
            alert('To się zawsze wykona');
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>

        } catch (e) {
            alert('Kod błędu: ' + e.number + ',
 Opis błędu: ' + e.message);

    </script>

<html>

<head>
    <title>przeglądarka plików graficznych</title>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function previewPic(sel) {
            document.smallpic.src = "" + sel.options[sel.selectedIndex].value;
        }
        function showBigPic(sel) {
            images = new Array();
            images[1] = "big1.jpg";
            images[2] = "big2.jpg";
            msg = images[sel.selectedIndex + 1];
            window.open(msg, "", "PicWindow", "toolbar=no,directories=no,menubar=no");
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body>
    <center>
        <form name="picform">
            <select name="selbox" size="1" onchange="previewPic(this)">
                <option value="small1.gif"> Zdjęcie numer 1
                <option value="small2.gif"> Zdjęcie numer 2
            </select>
            <p>
                <img name="smallpic" src="small1.gif" width="150" height="100" border="1">
                <p>
                    <input type="button" value="Powiększ" onclick="showBigPic(this.form.selbox)">
        </form>
    </center>
</body>

</html>

<html>

<head>
    <style type="text/css">
        div {
            text‐align: center;
            float: left;
            background‐color: silver;
        }
    </style>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        titleArray = new Array("Tatry", "Alpy", "Himalaje", "Bieszczady"); imgArray = new Array
            ("1.jpg", "2.jpg", "3.jpg", "4.jpg");
        slideTime = ‐ 1000;
        auto = false;
        mgNum = 0;
        function update(imgNum) {
            document.getElementById('title').innerHTML = titleArray[imgNum] +
                " " + (imgNum + 1) + "/" + imgArray.length;
            document.getElementById('slide').src = imgArray[imgNum];
        }
        function changeImage(direction) {
            imgNum = imgNum + direction;
            if (imgNum > imgArray.length ‐ 1) { imgNum = 2; }
            if (imgNum < 0) { imgNum = imgArray.length + 1; } update(imgNum);
        }
        function autoShow() {
            if (auto == true) {
                auto = false;
                window.clearInterval(intervalID);
                document.getElementById('start stop').src = "start.gif";
            } else if (auto == false) {
                auto = true;
                intervalID = setInterval("changeImage(1)", slideTime); document.getElementById('start
stop').src = "stop.gif";
   }
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body onload="javascript:update(0);">
    <div>
        <h3 id="title" style="color: white"></h3>
        <img id="slide" title="SlideShow" style="border‐style: ridge " />
        <br />
        <img src="first.gif" height="16" width="18" title="Pierwszy" onclick="javascript:update(0);" />
        <img src="prev.gif" height="16" width="18" title="Poprzedni" onclick="changeImage( ‐ 1)" />
        <img id="start_stop" src="start.gif" height="16" width="18" title="Pokaz automatyczny" onclick="autoShow()" />
        <img src="next.gif" height="16" width="18" title="Następny" onclick="changeImage(1)" />
        <img src="last.gif" height="16" width="18" title="Ostatni" onclick="javascript:update(imgArray.length ‐ 1);" />
    </div>
</body>

</html>
podpunkt.podpis:
1. Dodać element listy rozwijanej, z której można wybrać bezpośrednio numer rysunku
  2. Po kliknięciu na zdjęcie powinno wyświetlić się zdjęcie powiększone w nowym oknie

podpunkt.kod:
<html>

<head>
    <style>
        table {
            background: brown;
        }

        tr {
            background: yellow;
        }

        a (color:black; text‐decoration:none; ) a:hover (color:red; ) td.menu (background:lightyellow) table.menu (position:absolute; visibility:hidden; )
    </style>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function showMenu(idMenu) {
            document.getElementById(idMenu).style.visibility = "visible"
        }
        function hideMenu(idMenu) {
            document.getElementById(idMenu).style.visibility = "hiden"
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body>
    <table width="200px">
        <tr>
            <td onmouseover="showMenu('menu1')" onmouseout="hideMenu('menu1')">
                <div>Menu 1</div>
                <table class="menu" id="menu1" width="120">
                    <tr>
                        <td class="menu"><a href="http://www.prz.edu.pl" target=" blank">Podmenu
                                11</a></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                        <td class="menu"><a href="http://java.prz.edu.pl" target=" blank">Podmenu
                                12</a></td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
            <td onmouseover="showMenu('menu2')" onmouseout="hideMenu('menu2')">
                <div>Menu 2</div>
                <table class="menu" id="menu2" width="120">
                    <tr>
                        <td class="menu"><a href="http://web.prz.edu.pl" target=" blank">Podmenu
                                21</a></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                        <td class="menu"><a href="http://weii.prz.edu.pl" target=" blank">Podmenu
                                22</a></td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>

</html>

podpunkt.tytul: Budowa tabeli HTML z danych tablicy JS.
podpunkt.kod:
<html>

<head>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function changeTableContent() {
            var_data = [["aa", "ab", "ac"], ["ba", "bb", "bc"], ["ca", "cb", "cc"]];
            for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
                for (var j = 0; j < data[i].length; j++) {
                    document.getElementById('myTable').rows[i].cells[j].innerHTML = data[i][j];
                    document.getElementById('myTable').rows[i].cells[j].bg - Color = "red";
                }
            }
        }
    </script>
</head>

<body>
</body>
<table id="myTable" border="1">
    <tr>
        <td>11</td>
        <td>12</td>
        <td>13</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td>21</td>
        <td>22</td>
        <td>23</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td>31</td>
        <td>32</td>
        <td>33</td>
    </tr>
</table>
<form>
    <input type="button" onlick="changeTableContent()" value="Change">
</form>

</html>
